commands.name: az site-recovery alert-setting create
examples: az site-recovery alert-setting create -n defaultAlertSetting -g rg --vault-name vault_name --custom-email-addresses email@address.com --locale en_US --send-to-owners Send

commands.name: az site-recovery alert-setting list
commands.summary: List the list of email notification(alert) configurations for the vault.
examples: az site-recovery alert-setting list -g rg --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery alert-setting show
commands.summary: Get the details of the specified email notification(alert) configuration.
examples: az site-recovery alert-setting show -n defaultAlertSetting -g rg --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery alert-setting update
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery alert-setting update [--add]
                                      [--alert-setting-name]
                                      [--custom-email-addresses]
                                      [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--ids]
                                      [--locale]
                                      [--remove]
                                      [--resource-group]
                                      [--send-to-owners]
                                      [--set]
                                      [--subscription]
                                      [--vault-name]
examples: az site-recovery alert-setting update -n defaultAlertSetting -g rg --vault-name vault_name --custom-email-addresses email2@address.com --locale fr_FR --send-to-owners DoNotSend
